select asu.id as id, asu.subject_title as subjectTitle, asu.subject_description as moduleName, asu.subject_description as subjectDescription, f.file_path as subjectIconPath, asu.create_time as createTime, asu.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, asu.update_time as updateTime, asu.update_user as updateUser, asu.status as status from article_subject as asu left join user as u on asu.create_user = u.id left join files as f on asu.subject_icon_id = f.id where asu.status="1" order by asu.create_time desc
limit ${limit},${offset}
